common.platform-step: To get started first add platforms by clicking the Add button for the platform you want to save This will open the authentication screen
common.gateway-step: Next, You need to select a gatway client closest to your location to minimize SMS costs
common.compose-step: Finally, select the platform you want to publish to, and that's it! You've sent your first message using RelaySMS.
common.retrieving otp: We're trying to retrieve your OTP from your SMS inbox...
common.double check: If it doesn't auto-fill, double-check your phone number or manually enter the OTP.

tutorials.about info: RelaySMS (also known as SWoB, short for SMS Without Borders) is a tool that allows you to send secure online messages via SMS without requiring an internet connection.
tutorials.modem: A modem or an active SIM card in your computer
tutorials.modem info: This is essential for sending SMS using RelaySMS Desktop. Without a modem or SIM card, you cannot send SMS.
tutorials.save platfrom info: Navigate to the 'Platforms' tab and click the 'Add' button for the platform you want to save. This will open the authentication screen.
tutorials.select gateway client info: Go to the 'Gateway Clients' tab and select the gateway client (number) closest to your location to minimize SMS costs.
tutorials.compose message info: Open the 'Compose' tab, select the platform you want to publish to, and that's it! You've sent your first message using RelaySMS.
tutorials.alert: Ensure you have an active modem or SIM card in your computer to successfully send SMS.
